lines:
8

Karan

1936

3 Jarvis Hall 
Trinity College

Hartford, cu 
Dzar har. Stearns

I have been spending 
my Lemmer vacation at Harefad 
Cüce gely first. It is my réget 
that led or have time to write 
to your constantly

gan Reaid from the Plier 
Legation of Washinlon that my 
palker is coming to bemerin werk 
Prins Isain, the haval 
Commissioned; and will arrive 
at fan Francisco on iu lot of 
Reptember. I lope that you will
raw: 8 Karan 1936 3 Jarvis Hall Trinity College Hartford, cu Dzar har. Stearns I have been spending my Lemmer vacation at Harefad Cüce gely first. It is my réget that led or have time to write to your constantly gan Reaid from the Plier Legation of Washinlon that my palker is coming to bemerin werk Prins Isain, the haval Commissioned; and will arrive at fan Francisco on iu lot of Reptember. I lope that you will

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that Kwan has been in Hartford since July 1. He states that his father is to visit with Prince Tsai Hsun, the Naval Commissioner and they will arrive in San Francisco on September 16th. He hopes Stearns will meet his father then. He requests $50 for the Chinese students' conference.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
